title: owncloud 5.0 no login possible at apache2
body:
hi there, i installed owncloud 5.0 at my vserver (ubuntu). installation was success, but i can't login, always looping back to loginpage. at lighttpd with php5-fpm all works fine, so i guess its an configuration error. so what could be wrong? i used tools.php from forum, that says all green
disabling basic_auth dos not help. i reinstalled the server, so default apache2, default mysql settings and all clean, but no solution. it has to be an configuration error. following the installation guide again and again dos not help. 

iam running: php version 5.3.10-1ubuntu3.6 at ubuntu 12.04 with mysql.

here are a paste of phpinfo(): http://pastie.org/6489485

the vhosts:
```
  1 <virtualhost *:80>
  2   servername *****.******.**
  3   serveralias www.*****.******.**
  4   documentroot /var/www/owncloud
  5   serveradmin ****@******.**
  6   loglevel warn
  7   errorlog ${apache_log_dir}/vhosts/error.log
  8   customlog ${apache_log_dir}/vhosts/access-log combined
  9 </virtualhost>
```

```
  1 <ifmodule mod_ssl.c>
  2 <virtualhost *:443>
  3   sslengine on
  4   sslcertificatechainfile /****/****.crt
  5   sslcertificatekeyfile /****/****.key
  6   sslcertificatefile /****/****.crt
  7   serveradmin ****@******.**
  8   servername *****.******.**
  9   serveralias www.*****.******.**
 10   documentroot /var/www/owncloud
 11   loglevel warn
 12   errorlog ${apache_log_dir}/vhosts/ssl_error.log
 13   customlog ${apache_log_dir}/vhosts/ssl_access.log combined
 14 </virtualhost>
 15 </ifmodule>
```

directory settings:
```
  1 <directory "/var/www/owncloud">
  2   order allow,deny
  3   allow from all
  4   allowoverride all
  5 </directory>
```
